title: Redeeming tokens
body: Hi guys. Recently I redeemed 320 world tokens and received only a ward skin. To my knowledge I was also supposed to get the championship Ashe skin aswell. Is this assumption correct?

replies.body:
You receive the champion ashe golden chroma but not the skin itself (as well as your ward skin). 

If you purchase the Ashe skin at a later date you will already have the chroma unlocked.
i dont pay for this game ;-;
